review: It's a good game, just don't take it seriously or put your life's effort into it. If you really want to play this game then sure play all you want but in the later stages i suggest playing no more than 1/2 hours a day cause its gonna start ruining your brain due to losses and rigged gameplay. It has good graphics, okay-ish physics(PL is the cause of stupid deaths) and great gameplay but that's already been said for like 2 years by now. GOOD GAME JUST TRY IT, SMALLER FILE THAN GTA V.Edit: Basically the grind for new stuff takes forever because they keep adding new vehicles inbetween your current and what u r grinding.
The De-Foresters.Also there are weird natives that like to watch me ruin their habitat.

Its a great game, a mixture of rust and minecraft. Though there are some additions I would like e.g set spawns or select where you want to spawn(very helpful on multi player and new maps & gamemodes (yes i do understand ths is still in its early stages)
